channel.title: Site error?
channel.description:
I ran MikeRSWebv5.0 fine on an old host with no errors.
Now on my paid host with a domain I can get past the install with all images working correctly, but then when it says finish install I goto my site and it does this:
[code]http://ariascape.com/index.php[/code]
All the images and formatting break? Only text appears.
Anyone had this problem before?

item.title: Site error?
item.dc:creator: @AriaScape AriaScape
item.description:
@AriaScape wrote:

Fixed it just had to change $w = 1; to $w = 0; in functions.php

Read full topic

item.title: Site error?
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

Specify the correct css directorys, ariascape.com/www.runescape.com/layout-/css/home-2.css. I guess you didnâ€™t put which layout you wanted to use.
